pkgmetadata.longdescription: ROC, Precision-Recall, Convex Hull and other plots. // Creates single and multiple ROC plots, precision-recall, Bayes plots and others. The plots may be either rough or smooth with confidence limits. Threshold values, optimum points and other interesting points may be marked on the plots. The convex hull for multiple curves with blending fractions for interesting points may be obtained. The axes may have normal or lognormal scaling.
